question:
Balaji Vishwanath got which of the following rights from the Mughal Emperor, Farrukh Siyar?
1) Recognition of Shahu as the Maratha king
2) Permission to collect Chauth from six Mughal provinces
3) Permission to collect sardeshmukhi from six Mughal provinces
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
Balaji Vishwanath got the following rights from the then Mughal Emperor, Farrukh Siyar:
1) Recognition of Shahu as the Maratha king
2) Permission to collect Chauth from six Mughal provinces
3) Permission to collect sardeshmukhi from six Mughal provinces
